languages.text: {n}Абеляр устремляет взгляд на женщину и сводит брови.{/n} "Офицер, перед вами — {name} фон Валанциус, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}. Хоть вы, судя по всему, из подданных иной династии — извольте представиться по форме".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр устремляет взгляд на женщину и сводит брови.{/n} "Офицер, перед вами — {name} фон Валанциус, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}. Хоть вы, судя по всему, из подданных иной династии — извольте представиться по форме".

languages.text: {n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр устремляет взгляд на женщину и сводит брови.{/n} "Офицер, перед вами — {name} фон Валанциус, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}. Хоть вы, судя по всему, из подданных иной династии — извольте представиться по форме".

{n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."

{n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."

languages.text: {n}Abelard fulmina a la mujer con la mirada, frunciendo el ceño.{/n} «Oficial, la persona que tiene ante usted es {name} von Valancius, un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Aunque, por lo que deduzco, usted forma parte de otra dinastía, le convendría presentarse con el decoro adecuado».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard fulmina a la mujer con la mirada, frunciendo el ceño.{/n} «Oficial, la persona que tiene ante usted es {name} von Valancius, un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Aunque, por lo que deduzco, usted forma parte de otra dinastía, le convendría presentarse con el decoro adecuado».

languages.text: {n}Abelard funkelt die Frau böse an, seine Stirn legt sich in Falten.{/n} "Officer, die Person, die vor Euch steht, ist {name} von Valancius, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|ein Freihändler|eine Fernhändlerin}{/g}. Ihr seid zwar, so weit ich das sehe, Untertanin einer anderen Dynastie, doch Ihr tätet gut daran, Euch mit dem nötigen Anstand vorzustellen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard funkelt die Frau böse an, seine Stirn legt sich in Falten.{/n} "Officer, die Person, die vor Euch steht, ist {name} von Valancius, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|ein Freihändler|eine Fernhändlerin}{/g}. Ihr seid zwar, so weit ich das sehe, Untertanin einer anderen Dynastie, doch Ihr tätet gut daran, Euch mit dem nötigen Anstand vorzustellen."

languages.text: {n}Abélard lance un regard sombre à la jeune femme, les sourcils froncés.{/n} « Officière, vous avez devant vous {name} von Valancius, {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. À première vue, vous semblez répondre aux ordres d'une autre dynastie, mais je vous conseille vivement de vous présenter avec tout le décorum qui s'impose. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard lance un regard sombre à la jeune femme, les sourcils froncés.{/n} « Officière, vous avez devant vous {name} von Valancius, {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. À première vue, vous semblez répondre aux ordres d'une autre dynastie, mais je vous conseille vivement de vous présenter avec tout le décorum qui s'impose. »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头，盯着这名女子。{/n}“这位军官，你面前这位是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。虽然据我所知，你是另一个王朝的子民，但最好能以合适的礼仪，自我介绍一下。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头，盯着这名女子。{/n}“这位军官，你面前这位是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。虽然据我所知，你是另一个王朝的子民，但最好能以合适的礼仪，自我介绍一下。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは、眉間にしわを寄せて女性を睨みつける。{/n}「士官殿、あなたの目の前にいらっしゃるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様です。我がお見受けしたところ、あなたは他の王朝の​​家臣のようですね。ならば、きちんと礼儀正しく自己紹介したほうがよろしいかと」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは、眉間にしわを寄せて女性を睨みつける。{/n}「士官殿、あなたの目の前にいらっしゃるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様です。私が集めた情報によると、あなたは他の王朝の​​家臣のようで。きちんと礼儀正しく自己紹介したほうがよろしいかと」
{n}アベラルドは、眉間にしわを寄せて女性を睨みつける。{/n}「士官殿、あなたの目の前にいらっしゃるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様です。我がお見受けしたところ、あなたは他の王朝の​​家臣のようですね。ならば、きちんと礼儀正しく自己紹介したほうがよろしいかと」

languages.text: {n}Abelard, kaşlarını çatarak kadına dik dik bakıyor.{/n} "Asker, karşındaki kişi {name} von Valancius olur. Kendisi {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'dir{/g}. Anladığım kadarıyla başka bir hanedanlığın tebaasısın lakin doğru dürüst tekmil vermen icap eder."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at the woman, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Officer, the person before you is {name} von Valancius, a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Although you are, from what I gather, a subject of another dynasty, you would do well to introduce yourself with the proper decorum."

traits.locale_text: {n}"Abelard, kaşlarını çatarak kadına dik dik bakıyor.{/n} "Asker, karşındaki kişi {name} von Valancius olur. Kendisi {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'dir. Anladığım kadarıyla başka bir hanedanlığın tebaasısın lakin doğru dürüst tekmil vermen icap eder."
